com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.view.card.formatter

Class CardMaskAdapter

  • com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.view.card.formatter.CardMaskAdapter

  • public class CardMaskAdapter

    You can use this class to create customize card numbers mask inside the VGSCardNumberEditText.

    See Also:
    VGSCardNumberEditText

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardMaskAdapter

        public CardMaskAdapter()

        You can use this class to create customize card numbers mask inside the VGSCardNumberEditText.

        See Also:
        VGSCardNumberEditText

    • Method Detail

      • getMask

        @NotNull
protected java.lang.String getMask(@NotNull
                                            CardType cardType,
                                            @NotNull
                                            java.lang.String name,
                                            @NotNull
                                            java.lang.String bin,
                                            @NotNull
                                            java.lang.String mask)

        Returns prepared mask to display in VGSCardNumberEditText This method trigger when field detect new cardBrand.

        Parameters:
        cardType - detected card brand type
        name - detected card brand name
        bin - detected card brand bin
        mask - default format of the current card number
        Returns:
        String mask for the card number.
        See Also:
        VGSCardNumberEditText
